layout.singingstanza: Our God is so big, So strong, and so migh -- ty— There's noth -- ing our God can -- not do. Our God is so big, So strong, and so migh -- ty— There's noth -- ing our God can -- not do. The moun -- tains are His; The val -- leys are His; The stars are His hand -- i -- work, too. Our God is so big, So strong, and so migh -- ty— There's noth -- ing our God can -- not do.

lyrics.stanza: Our God is so big, So strong, and so mighty— There's nothing our God cannot do. That's right! (repeat)
Our God is so big, So strong, and so mighty— There's nothing our God cannot do. That's right!
